Oracle's meaning is unknown. Bronze script is the provincial language of "Â∑ø", it is the clothing covered on clothes in ancient times. The pot: "Red Scarf (Â∑ø)", the first year teacher Duigui: "Yi (Gi) Girl (Ru) Naiqi (ancestor) ) Towel (market)".

"Shuowen": "Wear towels. Congxuan, Xiangshiya. All the belongings of the towel are from the towel." See " Market "

towel
Basic explanation of words
towel
jƒ´n
Items used for wiping or wrapping or covering things are mostly made of textiles: hand towels. scarf. scarf. Pillow towel. napkin. Women's silk ("Â∏º" is the headscarf of ancient women, referring to women, such as "scarf hero").
towel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[‚ë†]Ôºªjƒ´nÔºΩ
["Guang Yun" Ju Yinqie, plain, see you. ]
(1) A piece of cloth for wiping, covering, wrapping, wearing, etc.
(2) The ancients used a scarf to wrap their head, which evolved into a crown, called a scarf.
(3) Package; cover.
(4) Refers to wearing a headscarf.
(5) Put a curtain on the car.
(6) Refers to the towel box.
(7) Finger towel dance. Detailed "Towel Whisk".
towel
